schema.name: 2018/11/11 Lunch

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the ingredients: dice the melon, cut the mango into chunks, and set aside.
Cook the pork nilaga according to your favorite recipe or simply boil until tender, about 45 minutes.
Simultaneously, boil the chicken livers for about 10 minutes until fully cooked, then set aside to cool before cutting into small pieces.
Combine the cooked pork nilaga, diced melons, mango chunks, and chicken livers in a bowl. Toss gently to mix.

schema.description: This low-sodium and healthy recipe makes a perfect lunch for those looking to enjoy a nutritious meal. Comprising pork nilaga, fresh diced cantaloupe, juicy mango chunks, and nutrient-rich chicken livers, it's a delightful mix of flavors and textures that embodies a healthified approach to eating.
